overview: Ben Kesser is a vietnam veteran that works for the mafia as a hitman. One night he discovers a clue about his wifes mysterious death and seeks revenge.  His friend, Hash Brown, a quirky teenage hacker rushes to his aid. Its is going to be a long and perilous adventure. They need the help of a very special friend. The elusive and wise Eric Virgo... a modern day samurai that has sworn never to kill again.  The three heroes venture deep into the New York Underground seeking the truth.  Very soon they discover that the man behind the murder is none other than Doctor Hans von Braun, the leader of the Nazi Ninjas... A crazy scientist with a dream to create a new army of.....  I've  said enough...
tagline: It's a comedy/parody of the All American Ninja Action Movies.
title: Karate: Blind Escape
